nodes.text: Tensor weapons were a class of weaponry that used tractor beam energy to harm living targets. Such weapons shot rapid pulses of compressed tractor beam waves that affected their target with an unrelenting stream of energy, the result of which caused cell disruption and eventually death. The Squib tensor rifle, manufactured by Amberlandrax Armaments, was a tensor weapon.
Although the tensor rifle is the only known example of a tensor weapon, Galladinium's Fantastic Technology establishes that the rifle is part of a more generalized class.
